page.title: 13THE NEW HARBOUR NEAR PAISLEY
page.content:
On the River Cart which runs close to our school,there is the new Industrial Estate built by money from the E.E.C. to create more jobs and a better env- ironment for the people of the area. Hidden in behind this is the site of the New Harbour. Map ref:-4865. The best view of the site is from the swing bridge over the River Cart at Carlvale Lane. This harbour was busy in the past but is largely unused except for some development work which is taking place at the moment.
Periodically there have been articles in the local newspaper about the harbour being developed into a kind of leisure complex, with small boats sailing on the river. These would be pleasure craft which local people could use. Perhaps in time this will come to be.
